value.description: Capability value

get.description: Gets the network endpoints of all outbound dependencies of a Disk Pool

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: diskPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the Disk Pool.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

value.description: Collection of resources.

items.description: Endpoints accessed for a common purpose that the App Service Environment requires outbound network access to.

category.description: The type of service accessed by the App Service Environment, e.g., Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Active Directory.

endpoints.description: The endpoints that the App Service Environment reaches the service at.

items.description: A domain name that a service is reached at, including details of the current connection status.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency.

endpointDetails.description: The IP Addresses and Ports used when connecting to DomainName.

items.description: Current TCP connectivity information from the App Service Environment to a single endpoint.

ipAddress.description: An IP Address that Domain Name currently resolves to.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

latency.description: The time in milliseconds it takes for a TCP connection to be created from the App Service Environment to this IpAddress at this Port.

isAccessible.description: Whether it is possible to create a TCP connection from the App Service Environment to this IpAddress at this Port.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

post.description: Shuts down the Disk Pool and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this Disk Pool uses. This operation can take 10 minutes to complete. This is expected service behavior.
